steps.step: Re-grab your opponent's right wrist with your right hand.
step toward 12:00 into a neutral bow as you pull your opponent's right hand to your right hip with your right hand. Simultaneously execute a hammering inward to your opponent's left elbow.
Execute a outward elbow behind your opponent's right ear.
Execute a outward horizontal palm heel to your opponent's right jaw.
Execute a upward palm heel claw to your opponent's face.
Execute a downward elbow to the middle of your opponent's spine.
Execute a downward palm heel to the back of your opponent's head.
pivot into a forward bow immediately followed by a vertical to your opponent's right ribs.
